name: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
shortDescription: A philosophical novel about following your dreams.
content: The Alchemist tells the mystical story of Santiago, an Andalusian shepherd boy who yearns to travel...

name: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
shortDescription: Classic romantic novel of manners in 19th century England.
content: Elizabeth Bennet navigates issues of manners, upbringing, morality, and marriage in early 19th-century England.

name: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
shortDescription: A novel about racial injustice in the Deep South.
content: Atticus Finch, a lawyer, defends a black man wrongly accused of a crime.

name: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
shortDescription: A story about the American dream and decadence.
content: Jay Gatsby tries to win back Daisy Buchanan amidst the Roaring Twenties.

name: The Silent Patient
author: Alex Michaelides
shortDescription: A psychological thriller about a woman's act of violence.
content: A shocking thriller of a woman’s act of violence against her husband.

name: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
author: Stieg Larsson
shortDescription: Mystery thriller with a hacker heroine.
content: Investigating a disappearance with twists and conspiracies.

name: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
author: Yuval Noah Harari
shortDescription: A compelling narrative of human history from the Stone Age.
content: Explores how Homo sapiens came to dominate the Earth.

name: The Wright Brothers
author: David McCullough
shortDescription: Biography of the inventors of the airplane.
content: Story of Orville and Wilbur Wright’s perseverance.

author: David McCullough
shortDescription: A narrative of the American Revolution.
content: Details the year of America’s fight for independence.

name: Wanderlust: A Journey Around the Globe
author: Emily Stone
shortDescription: An inspiring travel diary exploring 12 countries.
content: From the bustling streets of Tokyo to the calm fjords of Norway, this travelogue captures the spirit of discovery.

name: Into the Wild
author: Jon Krakauer
shortDescription: The true story of a young man's solo journey into Alaska.
content: A powerful narrative of adventure and the pursuit of meaning in the wilds of nature.

name: On the Road
author: Jack Kerouac
shortDescription: A classic road trip novel of freedom and rebellion.
content: Follow Sal Paradise and Dean Moriarty as they search for meaning across 1950s America.

name: The Art of Travel
author: Alain de Botton
shortDescription: A philosophical look at why and how we travel.
content: Blending stories, history, and reflections, this book explores the reasons behind our need to roam.
